actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the staff of Senator Dole and to authorize the testimony of such staff in the case of United States v. Michael Evan Bardoff, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent certain office staff members of Senator Robert Dole in the case of United States v. Michael Evan Bardoff, et al. Authorizes the Senate employees to testify in such case except concerning matters which may be privileged.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the staff of Senator Dole and to authorize the testimony of such staff in the case of United States v. Michael Evan Bardoff, et al.
